form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to extend certain protections against prohibited personnel practices, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Follow the Rules Act.

section.header: Prohibited personnel action based on ordering individual to violate rule or regulation

subsection.text: Subparagraph (D) of section 2302(b)(9) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting , rule, or regulation after law.
Such subparagraph is further amended by striking for.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives May 1, 2017.
